description: Number of n-celled polygons with perimeter 2n on square lattice.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: I. G. Enting and A. J. Guttmann, On the area of square lattice polygons, J. Statist. Phys., 58 (1990), 475-484.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Simon Plouffe_
